description.zh-cn: 元朝第二位皇帝及蒙古帝国第六位大汗。他是元世祖忽必烈的孙子，皇太子真金的第三子。在位期间，他停止了对外战争，致力于整顿国内军政，使社会矛盾得到暂时缓和，基本维持了守成的局面。然而，他晚年因病将朝政委于皇后及大臣，导致朝政日渐衰败。
description.en: The second emperor of the Yuan dynasty and the sixth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire. He was the grandson of Kublai Khan and the third son of Crown Prince Zhenjin. During his reign, he ceased foreign wars and focused on rectifying domestic military and political affairs, temporarily easing social conflicts and maintaining a stable state. However, in his later years, due to illness, he entrusted state affairs to the empress and ministers, leading to a gradual decline in governance.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国第五位大汗，元朝的创建者及首位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, and the founder and first emperor of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元世祖忽必烈次子，元成宗之父。被立为皇太子，但早于忽必烈去世。
description.en: The second son of Kublai Khan and the father of Temür Khan (Emperor Chengzong). He was appointed as Crown Prince but died before Kublai Khan.

description.zh-cn: 元世祖皇太子真金的王妃，元成宗的母亲。
description.en: The principal consort of Crown Prince Zhenjin and the mother of Temür Khan (Emperor Chengzong).

description.zh-cn: 元世祖皇太子真金的长子，元成宗的长兄。
description.en: The eldest son of Crown Prince Zhenjin and the elder brother of Temür Khan (Emperor Chengzong).

description.zh-cn: 元世祖皇太子真金的次子，元成宗的二哥。
description.en: The second son of Crown Prince Zhenjin and the elder brother of Temür Khan (Emperor Chengzong).

description.zh-cn: 元朝第三位皇帝，蒙古帝国第七位大汗，元成宗之侄。
description.en: The third emperor of the Yuan dynasty and the seventh Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, nephew of Emperor Chengzong.

description.zh-cn: 元朝初年重臣，支持元成宗即位。
description.en: An influential minister in the early Yuan dynasty who supported Temür Khan's accession to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 元成宗的皇后。在元成宗晚年患病时，实际掌握朝政。
description.en: An empress of Temür Khan (Emperor Chengzong). She effectively controlled the court when the emperor fell ill in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 元成宗的儿子，被立为皇太子但早逝。
description.en: Son of Temür Khan (Emperor Chengzong), who was appointed Crown Prince but died prematurely.

description.zh-cn: 窝阔台汗国实际统治者，长期与元朝对抗。
description.en: The de facto ruler of the Ögedei Khanate who engaged in a long-term conflict with the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 察合台汗国可汗，曾与海都联手对抗元朝，后臣服于元朝。
description.en: Khan of the Chagatai Khanate, who initially allied with Kaidu against the Yuan dynasty but later submitted to Yuan rule.

description.zh-cn: 钦察汗国（金帐汗国）可汗。
description.en: Khan of the Golden Horde.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的幼子，曾与兄长忽必烈争夺蒙古大汗之位。
description.en: The youngest son of Tolui, who contended with his brother Kublai for the title of Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷之子，伊儿汗国的建立者。
description.en: Son of Tolui and the founder of the Ilkhanate.

description.zh-cn: 由蒙古统治者忽必烈在中国建立的皇朝，为蒙古帝国的一部分。
description.en: An imperial dynasty of China established by Kublai Khan, leader of the Mongol Borjigin clan, and a part of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 历史上一个横跨欧亚大陆的帝国，由成吉思汗建立。
description.en: An empire that existed during the 13th and 14th centuries and was the largest contiguous land empire in history, founded by Genghis Khan.

en: Great Khan of the Mongol Empire

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国的最高统治者称号。
description.en: The title of the supreme ruler of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古四大汗国之一，由旭烈兀在波斯地区建立。
description.en: One of the four major khanates of the Mongol Empire, established in Persia by Hulagu Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古四大汗国之一，位于东欧。
description.en: One of the four major khanates of the Mongol Empire, located in Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古四大汗国之一，位于中亚。
description.en: One of the four major khanates of the Mongol Empire, located in Central Asia.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古四大汗国之一，位于中亚。
description.en: One of the four major khanates of the Mongol Empire, located in Central Asia.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈与阿里不哥之间为争夺蒙古帝国汗位而爆发的内战，最终导致蒙古帝国实质上分裂。
description.en: A civil war between Kublai Khan and his younger brother Ariq Böke for the title of Great Khan, which ultimately led to the de facto division of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 元武宗是答剌麻八剌的儿子。
description.en: Külüg Khan (Emperor Wuzong) was the son of Darmabala.

description.zh-cn: 在忽必烈去世后，支持其子铁穆耳（元成宗）即位。
description.en: After the death of Kublai Khan, she supported her son Temür (Emperor Chengzong) to ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 在忽必烈去世后，支持铁穆耳（元成宗）即位。
description.en: After the death of Kublai Khan, he supported Temür (Emperor Chengzong) to ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 在忽必烈去世后，甘麻剌作为真金长子退让汗位继承权，使得其弟铁穆耳（元成宗）得以即位。
description.en: After the death of Kublai Khan, Gammala, as the eldest son of Zhenjin, relinquished his claim to the throne, allowing his younger brother Temür (Emperor Chengzong) to become emperor.

description.zh-cn: 元成宗在忽必烈去世后继承其皇位。
description.en: Emperor Chengzong succeeded to the throne after the death of Kublai Khan.

description.zh-cn: 元武宗在元成宗去世后继承其皇位。
description.en: Emperor Wuzong succeeded to the throne after the death of Emperor Chengzong.

description.zh-cn: 元成宗即位后停止了对日本的征伐。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Chengzong stopped the military campaigns against Japan.

description.zh-cn: 元成宗即位后停止了对安南（越南）的征伐。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Chengzong stopped the military campaigns against Annam (Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 元成宗在位期间曾发兵征讨八百媳妇国。
description.en: During his reign, Emperor Chengzong dispatched troops to attack the Lanna kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷家族内战导致了蒙古帝国实质上的分裂。
description.en: The Toluid Civil War led to the de facto fragmentation of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈与阿里不哥为争夺汗位而爆发内战。
description.en: Kublai Khan and Ariq Böke fought a civil war over the succession to the title of Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 伊儿汗国自建立起就一直承认元朝的宗主地位。
description.en: The Ilkhanate recognized the suzerainty of the Yuan dynasty since its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 海都统治的窝阔台汗国长期与元朝对抗。
description.en: The Ögedei Khanate under Kaidu's rule was in long-term conflict with the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 都哇曾与海都结盟对抗元朝。
description.en: Duwa once allied with Kaidu against the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在海都去世后，都哇向元成宗表示臣服。
description.en: After Kaidu's death, Duwa submitted to Emperor Chengzong.

description.zh-cn: 钦察汗脱脱与元成宗的军队联合进攻海都之子察八儿和都哇。
description.en: Toqta of the Golden Horde allied with Emperor Chengzong's forces to attack Chapar, son of Kaidu, and Duwa.

description.zh-cn: 钦察汗国正式承认元朝名义上的宗主地位。
description.en: The Golden Horde formally recognized the nominal suzerainty of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1309年，窝阔台汗国被元朝和察合台汗国瓜分而灭亡。
description.en: In 1309, the Ögedei Khanate was partitioned and destroyed by the Yuan dynasty and the Chagatai Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 1309年，窝阔台汗国被元朝和察合台汗国瓜分而灭亡。
description.en: In 1309, the Ögedei Khanate was partitioned and destroyed by the Yuan dynasty and the Chagatai Khanate.
